directions.step:
1. Cut bacon slices into thirds.
2. Wrap a piece of bacon around a smoky link. Secure bacon around smoky like with a toothpick.
3. Put wrapped bacon slices with toothpicks into a casserole dish. Cover with brown sugar and refrigerate overnight.
4. Bake at 350 degrees F. for 45 to 60 minutes.
Source: Per Roberta Brisson, my girlfriend, JoAnn P.
Posted to recipelu-digest by QueenBerta@aol.com on Feb 3, 1998
